short_summary: Chief Combat Systems Integration needing digital subscription to increase digital skills in military members.
description: Chief Combat Systems Integration (CCSI) has 1 500 Digital Literacy Subscriptions requirement to increase the digital skills of CAF. Please refer to the documentation for further information.
full_summary:
**Tender Notice**
=====================================

**Solicitation Information**
---------------------------

*   **Solicitation Number**: CCSI-SaaS-SOL-0013
*   **Publication Date**: 2024-02-22
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-03-11T15:00:00 ( expired )
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-02-22
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: 2025-02-21

**Procurement Information**
-------------------------

*   **Procurement Category**: SRVTGD
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Trade Agreements**: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Services Required**
-------------------

*   The Government of Canada's Department of National Defence-Chief Combat Systems Integration (CCSI) is seeking up to 1500 digital literacy subscription licenses to increase the digital skills and knowledge of Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) members.

**Selection Criteria**
---------------------

*   This is a request for proposal (RFP) for digital literacy subscription licenses.

**Regions of Opportunity**
-------------------------

*   This solicitation is open to all qualified bidders worldwide.

**Regions of Delivery**
----------------------

*   The successful bidder will be required to deliver digital literacy subscription licenses nationally, with primary delivery to the National Capital Region (NCR).

**Contracting Entity**
-----------------

*   The Contracting Entity is the Department of National Defence-Chief Combat Systems Integration (CCSI), Carling Campus, 60 Moodie Drive, Nepean, ON K1A 0K2, Canada.

**Contact Information**
-----------------

*   Carol A. Hambleton, Chief Contracting Authority, email: Carol.Hambleton@forces.gc.ca, telephone: (613) 111-2222.

**Attachments**
------------

*   The following attachments are available:

    *   [Appendix A to SOL for Digital Literacy Licenses (xlsx)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32655/appendix-a-to-sor-for-digital-literacy-licenses.xlsx)
    *   [Addendum 1 to SaaS Solicitation CCSI-SaaS-SOL-0013 for Digital Literacy Licenses Subscriptions (pdf)](https://canadab
